q: Alassane Ouattara was recognised by world leaders as the winner of a Nov. 28 election, but has struggled to get control of the country's finances from incumbent Laurent Gbagbo who has resisted pressure to step down. Ivory Coast has no money to pay any debt at all, Patrick Achi , a spokesman for Alassane Ouattara 's rival government, told Reuters, days before the grace period for the coupon for Ivory Coast's$ 2.3 billion Eurobond due 2032 XS0496488395= R runs out.

And the company is launching more fuel-efficient powertrains so that customers won't flee to other brands as gas prices rise, he said. - crisis.html"> New York- The UN Security Council on Friday called for a peaceful and prompt href="http://www.earthtimes.org/tag/resolution.html"> resolution of the political stalemate in Ivory Coast, where strongman Laurent Gbagbo is still clinging to power. Council members underscore their strong desire that the crisis be resolved peacefully, rapidly and on conditions that respect the will of the Ivory Coast people, said Brazil Ambassador Maria Luiza Ribeiro Viotti , the council president.Maria Luiza Ribeiro Viotti reiterated previous calls by the 15-nation council for Ivory Coast to resolve the conflict over November's presidential elections that were claimed by Gbagbo and his internationally- recognized rival Alassane Ouattara .

Simon Cowell claims that allowing the crowd to react in real time Will Wright help him avoid overlooking another big star. There have been many, many times on these shows where I've hated somebody and practically had a mutiny going on behind me, he said.`` I don't believe Susan Boyle would have gone through in the old-fashioned audition method.'' Exactly which judges would be deliberating on the future Susan Boyles of America, he wouldn't say,
